name: Vengeful Spirit
title: Shendelzare
lore: Betrayed by her own sister, Shendelzare returns as a spirit seeking vengeance.

magicMissile.name: Magic Missile
magicMissile.description: Fires a missile at a target, stunning and damaging them.

waveOfTerror.name: Wave of Terror
waveOfTerror.description: Sends a wave that damages and reduces enemy armor while revealing them.

vengeanceAura.name: Vengeance Aura
vengeanceAura.description: Increases attack damage of nearby allies. On death, creates a spirit illusion.

netherSwap.name: Nether Swap
netherSwap.description: Swaps positions with a target ally or enemy.
